title: Blackstone River Valley National Historical Park: 1 James Fletcher Homestead
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Do     Self Guided Walking Tours     Whitinsville Self Guided Tour     1 James Fletcher Homestead                  1 James Fletcher Homestead        Whitin's Patent Pick and Spreader, the basis of the Whitin Machine Works NPS       Your tour begins at the James Fletcher Homestead, now the Northbridge Historical Society. This house was built in 1770 by Colonel James Fletcher. Fletcher set up the first iron forge in the community, and later helped established the first cotton mill here.       Introduction 2 1826 Brick Mill 3 Granite Cotton Mill 4 Whitin Machine Works 5 Whitin Mansions 6 Memorial Square
